title: Urgot Poro
body:
With the last batch of champion-themed poro pictures out today, I was wondering why there isn't an Urgot poro? I was kinda hoping for one... Same with Yorick as well, he doesn't have a poro version either. Are these champions just that rejected D:

{{champion:83}} and {{champion:6}}  poros please :c

~ EDIT: I noticed a fair few champion poros were missing, but still, I want my Urgot poro c:

replies.body:
While this doesn't count, it still makes me happy!

http://static.tumblr.com/8f167aa106df1015a4e1d27de4f2231c/3jyupcx/vJ7mnalcx/tumblr_static_tumblr_mmut5ujqs81rczihjo1_500.png
What if Urgot is a poro?

> [{quoted}](name=FioraTheExplorer,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=n37Eq78c,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-19T07:37:57.039+0000)
>
> What if Urgot is a poro?

:O Mind Blown

We deserve to urget more from Riot concerning Urgot.
I would love to see a poro with Urgot's legs and some of the tubes and stuff running through him. It'd be sickeningly cute.
